attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♂️✨ This app is horrendous ✨🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.review: I just wanted to see the best ways to educate myself about our president but the app just glitches and honestly my phone is bugging out now. DONT GET THE APP!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: There was a glitch and I downloaded this just to see if trump did something helpful to the United States

I wanted this app for our great president trump🤩🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚we stan trump for very clear Orange skin 👁👄👁this app is soooo glitchy and I was looking for reasons why to vote for him and it ended up giving me why not to vote for him 🥺GUYS STAN TRUMP 2020😩🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚❤️🧚🧚WE LOVE OUR PRESIDENT 😌🖐🏽👁👄👁🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: They always call and text it will be very annoying

attributes.title: Switching to Democratic Party
attributes.review: I used to be a dedicated conservative but this president has embarrassed my party. As of today I have bought my Bernie Hillary and joe merchandise. So disappointed In you trump.

attributes.title: TAKES TOO MUCH SPACE
attributes.review: this app takes so much space but actually I don’t know why because it has so little information 🤭✨🌹🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Don’t download not worth your time!!
attributes.review: This app is so bad that it like rearrange all my apps I have no idea why and it’s glitches a lot

attributes.title: Killed me😱😱😱!😰😭..
attributes.review: I opened the app and saw his face and I literally died!!! This is her mother typing this,,she lost control of her bowels and entered anaphylactic shock and a seizure. Would rate 0 stars if I could, fly high bb💋💔🛐😛

attributes.title: IM SCARED
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app so know sum wonderful facts about our wonderful president and i saw this creepy orange blob just looking at me and it wanted to talk to me and it tried to kill me, DO NOT, I REPEAT DO NOT GET THIS APP it’s not safe for any age 💅🏼

attributes.title: NOT A GOOD APP
attributes.review: Don’t download this app it’s not working for me and any other people besides this is a waste of your storage and a waste of your time so don’t download it.
